definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
John Leighton Stuart (1876-1962), second-generation American missionary in China, first president of Yenching University and later United States ambassador to China

sentences.english: The angry Stuyvesant went to Fort Amsterdam and prepared to open fire on the British.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的司徒维桑特走到阿姆斯特丹堡准备向英方开火。

sentences.english: The police to the scene could not find Jenny to SiTuShun worried.
sentences.chinese: 警方于现场找不到珍妮二人令司徒舜心急如焚。

sentences.english: One day, he came to see Dong Zhuo with a borrowed blade.
sentences.chinese: 一日，曹操借王司徒宝刀一口，藏刀来到相府。
固执的司徒维桑特没有回信。

sentences.english: North Stone River tributary of the main shops are Situ River.
sentences.chinese: 北石店河的支流主要是司徒河。

sentences.english: They received a call of Mr Fung Yuen.
sentences.chinese: 接见他们的是一个叫袁逢的司徒。

sentences.english: Stuart couples celebrate at home for family virtue full table delicacies.
sentences.chinese: 司徒夫妇在家庆祝，美德为家人准备满桌佳肴。

sentences.english: SiTuShun suddenly receive static Vivian calls, said she is now in the airport.
sentences.chinese: 司徒舜突然接到静雯来电，说她现在身处机场。

sentences.english: Stubbs Road Flyover will be temporarily closed to all vehicular traffic.
sentences.chinese: 司徒拔道天桥将临时封闭，禁止所有车辆行驶。

sentences.english: John Leighton Stuart was the US Ambassador to China during the Second Civil War between the KMT and the CPC.
sentences.chinese: 司徒雷登在第二次国共内战期间任美国驻华大使。

sentences.english: Dr Szeto refused to disclose the cause of death.
sentences.chinese: 司徒医生拒绝透露病人死因。

sentences.english: The town was once dominated by two families: the Guan family and the Situ family.
sentences.chinese: 这个小镇曾经被两大家族掌控，他们是关氏和司徒氏。
